RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectMesh

RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectMesh Class Reference

#include <objectmesh.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectMesh:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Defines a static mesh.

To allowing multiple instance of a single mesh, it stores an ObjectPosList.

void RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectMesh::setMeshFile ( const char *  n  ) 

Sets the filename of the mesh.

Do not set the directory. The mesh will be loaded by Ogre and it will search in the ressources already loaded.

Parameters:
n The new mesh filename

Definition at line 118 of file objectmesh.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectMesh::addPos ( const ObjectPos &  pos  ) 

Adds a ObjectPos.

This function use the ObjectPos copy constructor to add a new object. The instance you add can be a local instance, deleted after this call.

Parameters:
pos The ObjectPos to add
